metadata.Title: CVE-2022-21695 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.Description: OnionShare is an open source tool that lets you securely and anonymouslyshare files, host websites, and chat with friends using the Tor network. Inaffected versions authenticated users (or unauthenticated in public mode)can send messages without being visible in the list of chat participants.This issue has been resolved in version 2.5.

criterions.comment: onionshare package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
